column1: Smoque BBQ////We finally made it to Smoque
column2: and it was everything we had heard it would be and more. We picked up and brought home
column3: and everything stayed warm and delicious after the 20 minute drive. We got chicken
column4: which was so moist and smoky
column8: which was also moist and full of flavor. For sides we got the cornbread and the mac and cheese
column9: which come in little metal containers that they're baked in
column10: so everything stays really moist. The bread was full of flavor and had pieces of corn in it
column11: and the mac and cheese had a great topping.
